title: Calories in a Half Apple
meta_description: Discover calories in a half apple, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown per serving.
assumptions: Medium apple (~182 g whole, raw with skin, no core; half is ~91 g edible portion).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by apple variety, size, ripeness, and preparation; organic vs. conventional may differ slightly. Check sources for specifics.

quick_answer.text: A half medium apple provides ~48 kcal, mainly from natural sugars and fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a half apple?
faqs.a: About 48 kcal for half a medium apple with skin.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in half an apple?
faqs.a: Approximately 12.6 g carbs, including 2.2 g fiber and 9.5 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is a half apple low in fat or protein?
faqs.a: Yes, negligible fat (0.2 g) and protein (0.3 g); mostly carbs from natural sources.

faqs.q: Does apple variety affect calories in a half apple?
faqs.a: Slightlyâ€”Granny Smith may have fewer sugars/calories than Fuji; averages ~48 kcal.

faqs.q: How does peeling change calories in half an apple?
faqs.a: Peeling removes ~5 kcal and some fiber, reducing to ~43 kcal.
